description: Species code, based on one or more sources
Accepted species code, based on one or more sources
Earliest date at which the taxonID was mapped to the corresponding acceptedTaxonID
Latest date at which the taxonID was mapped to the corresponding acceptedTaxonID
The scientific name of the kingdom in which the taxon is classified
The scientific name of the phylum or division in which the taxon is classified
The scientific name of the class in which the taxon is classified
The scientific name of the order in which the taxon is classified
The scientific name of thefamily in which the taxon is classified
The scientific name of the subfamily in which the taxon is classified
The scientific name of the tribe in which the taxon is classified
The scientific name of the genus in which the taxon is classified
The scientific name of the subgenus in which the taxon is classified
The unofficial species group into which the taxon is categorized
The specific epithet (second part of the species name) of the scientific name applied to the taxon
The infraspecific epithet (scientific name below the rank of species) of the scientific name applied to the taxon
Scientific name, associated with the taxonID. This is the name of the lowest level taxonomic rank that can be determined
Name of the individual(s) who designated the scientific name of the taxon
The lowest level taxonomic rank that can be determined for the individual or specimen
A common or vernacular name
The reference to the source in which the specific taxon concept circumscription is defined or implied (e.g., reference keys, monographs, names of experts)
An identifier for the source in which the specific taxon concept circumscription is defined or implied
The reference to the source describing whether the taxon is established in NEON Domain 20
